content: Our independent research and referral work is free for executives who are facing business expansion decisions because we are supported by leading professionals who can deliver valuable services to more executives than they might reach through their own professional networking activities, events, and exclusive marketing efforts.

content: Hackers continue to spoof our published e-mail address or use fictitious addresses with our domain name as they send out spam or infected messages. Messages which may appear to be from us do not actually come from any of our systems. Please refer to our latest information about known attacks of this nature.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td font span
content: Our actual outbound e-mails to our contacts are sent from an unpublished address, and are very specific in their subject lines about the content. They rarely have any file attachments unless the recipient knows us well and is expecting to receive the file per prior correspondence.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td p font span

content: Congratulations : to Grameen Bank, Bangladesh - and to economist Muhammad Yunus

tag: html body text table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td p font span
html body text table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td p font b span
html body text table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td p font span
content: Laureate Muhammad Yunus and the Grameen Bank he founded to promote local economic development and alleviate poverty through microcredit programs.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td p font span
content: These enabled small groups of poor people in Bangladesh to access unsecured loans in very small amounts for their own self-help business efforts which would not be possible through the traditional bank loan processes. This made it possible for many poor people to find their own path out of poverty through their work and savings, rather than rely on high-cost sources of capital or continuous government aid, social programs, or charity. This development model has been repeated elsewhere as an effective approach to poverty reduction challenges, and adopted by various non-profit charitable organizations as a way to leverage the economic impact of their limited resources.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td p font span
content: The Nobel Lecture by the winner, typically in December, should be a very interesting presentation, as was the

tag: html body text table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td p font a span
html body text table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td p font span
content: when Prof. Wangari Muta Maathai of Kenya won it for her Green Belt Movement's contributions to sustainable development, democracy and peace..

tag: html body text table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td b a font span
html body text table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td p font b a span
html body text table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td p font span
content: One of the interesting concepts promoted by Muhammad Yunus and others is the idea of "non-loss" companies with a clear social purpose as their main objective. In short, they are managed like for-profit business ventures, but are not managed for profit maximization, but rather to maximize the desired social impact of their work.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td p font span
content: This differs from the typical nature of "non profit" organizations, which may similarly focus on trying to achieve good social outcomes, but perhaps more from the perspective of raising and distributing money or other benefits as charity rather than by managing the process for demonstrable results as in a business venture.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td p font span
content: In other words, a non-profit may measure activity (how much it has given away and to how many) rather than results (what has been changed to achieve sustainable social or economic progress beyond immediate crisis-response). This concept of business-like social ventures has started to catch on with philanthropic business leaders who want to achieve lasting results, as reflected in some of the resources listed in our

tag: html body text table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td p font a span
